title: Laura Prepon cradles her baby bump for first red carpet appearance since announcing second pregnancy
text:
She announced her second pregnancy on Thursday.

And Laura Prepon's baby bump made its red carpet debut at the 2019 American Valor: A Salute to Our Heroes Veterans Day Special in Washington D.C. on Saturday.

The 39-year-old made it a parents night out a she was joined by husband Ben Foster.

On display: On Saturday, 39-year-old Laura Prepon's baby bump made its red carpet debut at the 2019 American Valor: A Salute to Our Heroes Veterans Day Special in Washington D.C

Laura, 39, was styled in a black, long-sleeve gown complete with a zig-zag design.

The That '70s Show star wore her long hair straight, down and parted in the middle. Laura's makeup featured golden eye make-up and a pink lip.

Her actor husband Ben, 38, looked sharp in a classic, yet modern suit.

It's a date: The beauty made it a parents night out a she was joined by husband Ben Foster

Her look: Laura was styled in a black, long-sleeve gown complete with a zig-zag design

On Thursday, Laura took to Instagram to announce that she was pregnant.

'We are so excited to announce that our family is growing. Life is beautiful! #knockedup,' wrote the star.

In the snap, Laura, dressed in a black T-shirt, sweetly held her eldest daughter Ella, two.

Baby on the way: On Thursday, Laura took to Instagram to announce that she was pregnant. In the snap, Laura, dressed in a black T-shirt, sweetly held her eldest daughter Ella, two

Laura became engaged in the fall of 2016. The duo married last June.

Laura's recent role was as Alex Vause in Orange is the New Black. But, the star is active on her Youtube channel, and recently surpassed 100,000 subscribers, making her current total to 166,000.

Ben has four projects in the workd including Harry Haft, Violence of Action, Medieval and Peter Pan, Land of Forever.
description: She announced her second pregnancy on Thursday.
